title: 我想报名业余辅导课程

conversations.english: Are you looking for a course?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but I'm not sure which one to sign up for.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,可是我不知道该报名哪一个课程.

title: 你决定去哪个国家留学了吗?

conversations.english: What do you think of studying abroad?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得出国留学怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: I think it's a great idea. Studying abroad will offer you plenty of new opportunities. Are you planning on going abroad?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得这是个很好的想法.出国留学能为你创造很多新机会.你打算出国留学吗?

title: 留学后我打算回中国发展

conversations.english: How was your education going on in Australia?
conversations.chinese: 你在澳大利亚读书还好吗?
conversations.reply_english: I'm going to graduate this summer.

title: 电话询问继续教育课程

conversations.english: Hello, this is the admissions office. Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 你好，这里是招生办公室，有什么可以为你效劳？
conversations.reply_english: Hi. I’m calling about your continuing education program.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我打电话来询问你们学校继续教育课程的有关情况。

title: 每周二晚都要去上夜校

conversations.reply_english: It’s Tuesday today. I always go to my class on Tuesday night.
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天是星期二。我星期二晚上通常要去上课。

title: 我报了数学暑期速成班

conversations.english: What are you studying all day long for? It’s summer vacation!
conversations.chinese: 你成天学习为了什么？这可是暑假。
conversations.reply_english: I know! I hate it! But I’m taking this crash course in math.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道。我也不想呀。可是我上了数学的速成班。

conversations.english: I've been thinking of taking a Crazy English course.Do you think it's a good idea?
conversations.chinese: 我正在考虑参加疯狂英语班，你觉得好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure!You should do anything you can to improve your English.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然好了！你应该尽一切可能提高你的英语水平。

title: 在国外这一年打算做什么

conversations.english: What are you going to do for your year abroad, Tim?
conversations.chinese: 你在国外的这一年打算做什么，提姆？
conversations.reply_english: Study study study! I want to learn a lot.
conversations.reply_chinese: 学习学习再学习。我想多学点东西。

title: 学一些额外的英语课程

conversations.english: Daniel, I can't catch up with the English teacher very well.
conversations.chinese: 丹尼尔，我跟不上英语老师的课。

title: 想获得奖学金减轻家里的负担

conversations.english: I've been so stressed these days.
conversations.reply_english: What's the matter? Are you OK?

title: 为什么不考注册会计师

conversations.english: You are late again, Maria. The teacher is about to come.
conversations.chinese: 你又迟到了，玛丽亚。老师就快要来了。
conversations.reply_english: I know. I have to prepare the supper for the whole family before I leave.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道，但是我在走之前必须要做好全家的晚饭。

conversations.english: Finally the class is over. Be quick. Ben must have been waiting for long.
conversations.chinese: 课终于上完了。快点，本杰明一定等了很长时间了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I am so tired. My back is sore and my neck hurts.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我好累呀，背很酸，脖子也疼。
